text: La descarriada is a 1973 Spanish comedy film directed by Mariano Ozores and starring Antonio Ozores, Florinda Chico, Lina Morgan and Rafaela Aparicio. ==Cast== ==References== ==External links== * Category:Spanish comedy films Category:Spanish films Category:1970s sex comedy films Category:Films directed by Mariano Ozores Category:Films shot in Madrid Category:Films about prostitution in Spain Category:1973 comedy films
title: La descarriada
